summary: Reverse mortgages allow seniors to convert part of their home equity into payments from a lender while still living in their homes. Seniors run the risk of defaulting and losing their homes if they don’t continue to pay taxes and meet other conditions. title: Reverse Mortgages: FHA's Oversight of Loan Outcomes and Servicing Needs Strengthening
